roleset.name: delete two genes simultaniously
roleset.note: CODELETION-N NOTES: Based on Thyme data. Comparison to deletion.01. Deletion.01 is a member of VN class remove-10.1. Framed by Katie. (from codeletion.01-n)

example.name: arg 1 only
example.text: genetic analysis showed co-deletion of p and 19q.

example.name: all args
example.text: Griff's codeletion of WRX 8a3itp from the virus cause it to stop replicating, laying the ground work for finding an outright cure.
